articles.author: Srishty Choudhury
articles.title: Mukesh Ambani's move to acquire Disney Star may change cricket viewing in India, here's how - DNA India
articles.description: The stakes are high, particularly in the realm of cricket, as the combined broadcasting rights of Reliance's Viacom18 and Disney Star for major cricket properties in India amount to nearly Rs 55,000 crore for the next 4-5 years.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: SBI to sign 200 mn euro LoC with EIB for climate action projects - Moneycontrol
articles.description: State Bank of India (SBI) to sign a 200 million euro Line of Credit (LoC) with the European Investment Bank (EIB) for climate action projects in India.
articles.content: State Bank of India (SBI) on Thursday said it will sign a 200 million euro (about Rs 1,800 crore) Line of Credit (LoC) with the European Investment Bank (EIB) for supporting climate action projects i… [+581 chars]
